dcterms:description: The dataset contains 60,000 and 10,000 images of ten-class (0-9) handwritten digits in the training and test sets, respectively, and each image has the size of 28Ã—28 pixels. The image data were pre-processed to have zero mean and unit variance.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 50,000 movie reviews from IMDB, which are labelled into two classes according to sentiment (positive or negative), and both training and test sets contain 25,000 reviews. These reviews are encoded as a sequence of word indices based on the overall frequency in the dataset.
dcterms:title: IMDB
